1.content:
Alright, the first question is:

Is this person we are focusing on

A. Nighttime toilet training?

or B. Suffering from bedwetting?
1.title: Beginning

11.content: Alright then, is this nighttime toilet trainer a boy or a girl?
11.title: Nighttime toilet training.

11121.content:
Once upon a time there was a little boy who was four years old (well, if you want to get technical, four and a half), who lived with his parents and his older sister Roxanne.
The boy's name was Carter, and while he was potty trained during the day, he was still learning to use the toilet at night.
He....
11121.title: Carter, age 4 1/2

111211.content: Alright, so the little lad has some protection at night. Now what is it, eh?
111211.title: Wore protection.

1112111.content:
Carter wore diapers to bed at night.
Where is he now?
1112111.title: Nighttime diaper

11121111.content:
Carter is laid down after his bath and changed into his diaper.

"Do you have to go before bed?" Dad asks.
11121111.title: Getting ready for bed.

111211111.content:
"No," said Carter.
So, then, his father...
111211111.title: Carter says no.

111211112.content: Carter shifted, nodding. He had to...
111211112.title: Carter says yes.

choices: Carter's father turns the lights out.
1112111121.content:
"Yes, I have to pee," said Carter, so he went to the bathroom, pulled his pants down, and peed.
He then finished up, washed his hands, and got into bed.
What happens now?
1112111121.title: Pee heavily

1112111122.content:
Carter had to poop, so he went into the bathroom, sat on the toilet, and did his business.
When he was done, he wiped himself, flushed the toilet, put his diaper back on, pulled up his pants, and washed his hands.
He then went back to bed, where...
1112111122.title: Poop heavily

1112111123.content:
He had to pee *and* poop, so his dad helped him out of his diaper, then he went to the bathroom to take care of business.
When he was done, his dad helped him into his diaper again and he washed his hands.
He then...
1112111123.title: Pee and Poop Heavily

choices: Being put down from a nap
Waking up in the middle of the night

It was bedtime.
Carter got changed into his PJs and diaper.
What happens now?
111211122.title: Going to bed

111211123.content:
Carter woke up.
He looked around; it wasn't morning yet.
Was his diaper wet?
111211123.title: Waking up in the middle of the night

1112111231.content: This makes Carter feel a negative emotion. Which one?
1112111231.title: Yes.

choices: He was sick of bedwetting and wanted it to stop.
He didn't want to spend time getting his diaper changed.
He was having such a good dream.
A technique that he'd tried to stop wetting had failed.
He didn't want to disappoint his parents.
11121112311.title: Sadness.

11121112312.content:
Carter was embarrassed, but he decided he needed to get his diaper changed anyway.
Blushing, he went over to...
11121112312.title: Embarrasment.

11121112314.content:
Carter was frustrated.
When was he going to stop wetting already?!
But he still had a wet diaper to deal with, so he went over to...
11121112314.title: Frustration.

Carter felt he was too grown up for diapers or Pull-Ups, so he wore underwear to bed.
But he had a plastic sheet so that the mattress didn't get wet.

choices: Being put down from a nap?
Waking up in the middle of the night

choices: He gets read a bedtime story.

It was bedtime for Carter.
He was in his PJs and climbing into his bed with the plastic sheet.
What happens?
111211221.title: Heading to bed

Carter woke up.
He looked around and could tell that it was the middle of the night.
Was his bed wet?
111211223.title: Waking up in the middle of the night

1112113.title: Other

choices: Carter waited until his parents had left, then played on the floor.
Carter fell asleep and had a nightmare.
Carter had a nice dream involving water.
11121131.content:
Carter wore Peejamas-fancy absorbent PJs that meant he didn't need any diapers or Pull-Ups.

Carter's put into them after his bath, and then snuggles up into bed. What happened after than that?
11121131.title: Peejamas (look it up).

111211311.content:
Carter could be a bit of a rascal sometimes, so when his parents left the room, he climbed out of bed, turned the light back on, and started playing with his train set.
Did anyone hear him?
111211311.title: Carter waited until his parents had left, then ...

111211312.content:
Carter fell asleep.
He soon began having a nightmare--- his mother was there, but she had a dog's face and she was threatening to throw his father out the window!
Does Carter wake up from the nightmare?
111211312.title: Carter fell asleep and had a nightmare.

111211313.content: Carter had a nice dream as he slept. He dreamt he was a captain aboard a ship, sailing the seven seas. This caused his little bladder ro kick into gear. A few droplets of pee began dribbling ibto his peejamas. Does he awaken?
111211313.title: Carter had a nice dream involving water.

1112113131.content:
Carter woke up, but he was already peeing.
He ran to the bathroom, but was he able to get any pee into the toilet?
1112113131.title: Yes

1112113132.content:
Carter didn't wake up, so he fully wet his peejamas.
Thankfully, they worked and the bed didn't get wet.
Does this wake him up?
1112113132.title: No

111211314.content:
Carter had a good dream.
He dreamt he could fly and had a talking, flying cat for a sidekick.
Does he wet the bed that night?
111211314.title: Carter had a good dream.

111211321.content:
Little Carter wore some underpants which were absorbent but not like diapers.
Right now, he was...
111211321.title: Absorbent underwear.

111211322.content:
Carter wore Pull-Ups to bed at night.
Right now, he was...
111211322.title: Nighttime Pull-Ups.

1112113225.content: Carter was in bed at night, when he felt a need to....
1112113225.title: In bed at night.

11122.content:
Michael was a 3 year old boy who had just gotten into daytime undies but still wet the bed. His parents aren't concerned, as he's still young.

After Michael's evening bath, Dad laid him down to put him into a...
11122.title: Michael, age 3

111221.content:
Dad put Michael into a diaper.
"This is just in case you pee in the night," he said, "It's normal for kids your age to not know how to wake up at night to pee. You'll get it eventually."
Michael then put on his pyjamas and Dad tucked him in bed with a bedtime story.
What now?
111221.title: ...diaper.

111222.content:
Dad helped Michael get into his nighttime Pull-Up and pyjamas.
He then sang him a lullaby, turned out the light, and left the room.
"Goodnight, my little boy," he said.
What happens now?
111222.title: ...night Pull-Up.

choices: A watery dream that makes Michael wanna pee.
He wakes up, having to go.
1112221.content: What happens in the middle of the night?
1112221.title: Something happens at night.

choices: It was morning and he'd wet his Pull-Up.
It was night and he'd wet his Pull-Up.
It was night, but he was dry.
It was morning and he was dry.
11122211.content:
Michael was having a nightmare.
It was about a nasty man in a black cloak trying to feed him to a fish with six eyes!
He woke up with a start to find that...
11122211.title: A nightmare.

11122212.content:
Michael was dreaming about water.
He dreamt that he was at the beach and it was raining and they were having a hose fight.
This made him have to pee.
What happens to Michael?
11122212.title: A watery dream that makes Michael wanna pee.

11122213.content:
Michael woke up in the night.
He had to go to the bathroom, so he went into the bathroom, peed, and washed his hands.
He then went back to bed and fell asleep.
The next morning, he was...
11122213.title: He wakes up, having to go.

11122214.content:
Michael woke up wet.
He went to get his Pull-Up changed by...
11122214.title: He wakes up, already wet.

111223.content:
Michael wore undies to bed because he felt he was too old for diapers or Pull-Ups.
But his bed had protective sheets so that the mattress didn't get wet.
"Nighty-night, Michael," he said, and...
111223.title: ...bed with protective sheets.

111224.content:
Dad was putting Michael into a pair of cloth bedwetting pants.
They were designed to make it so that Michael could tell he was wet, but his pants stayed dry.
Then, Dad...
111224.title: ...cloth bedwetting pants.

12.content: Is this bedwetter a boy or a girl?
12.title: Bedwetting.

121.content: How old is this bedwetter?
121.title: Boy.

1211.content: What's the exact age of the bedwetter?

12122.content: Your name is Tyler, you turned 8 about 4 months ago and you are still having trouble keeping your pants dry at night. Because of this your parents decide to keep you in...
12122.title: Eight.

choices: Complaining to his parents about the Pull-Ups.
121221.content:
This isn't a "you" story, it's all in third person.

Once upon a time, there was an eight-year-old boy named Tyler.
He was clever, but he still wet the bed at night, so his parents, Louise and Henry, decided to keep him in Pull-Ups at night.

Tyler hated the Pull-Ups! He wasn't a baby!
But his parents thought it was what was best for him.
Where is Tyler when we first see him?
121221.title: Night time pull ups

choices: A t-shirt with some pj pants
1212211.content:
We join Tyler as he is exiting the bathroom after a lengthy shower. He walks to his room with a towel around his waist and prepares to get ready for bed. Tyler opens his closet and takes out one of his night time pull ups from the large card board package, he looks at the pull-up feeling embarrassed that he still had night time accidents, his parents always tell him, “As soon as we know you can stay dry through the night you wont need them any more, promise.”

Tyler always tried his hardest to stay dry at night but whatever he seems to try seems to still leave him wet in the morning, even forcing himself to go pee right before bed doesn't seem to help.

Which leaves him where he is now, pulling on a boys night time pull-up, complete with space and night sky designs, over his privates. Tyler then looks at his options for pajamas tonight...
1212211.title: Getting ready for bed.

12122111.content: What kind of designs does Tyler wear on his pjs?
12122111.title: A t-shirt with some pj pants

choices: Watch a movie with his parents
121221111.content:
Tyler likes everything about sports, especially watching his favorite teams and players play. So, he picked out his favorite pair of pj pants, they were black pants with the logo of every NFL football team on them. With these, Tyler picked out a shirt with the name and number of his favorite player on the back and the team logo on the front.

Tyler slid the pants up his legs and over his fresh, clean pull-up, which was covered with child-like space and planet designs. The pull-up visibly peeked above the waistline of the pants and an outline of the absorbent underwear also showed through the pants in the front and back, especially when Tyler would bend down to pick something up. He then pulled his night shirt over his head and decided what to do with the rest of the night...
121221111.title: Sporty pjs

12122112.content: How about a footed sleeper?
12122112.title: Something else

121222.content:
This isn't a "you" story, it's all in third person.

Really? Diapers? That's not the only option.
Tyler had....
121222.title: Diapers

12123.content: Is our bedwetting boy 9 or 10?

1213.content: How old is the boy?

12131.content:
Brady is a pretty typical 11 year old boy, he likes playing sports like hockey and baseball, hes constantly playing video games with his spare time and cant stand sitting in school all day.

What makes him not so typical for a boy his age is that he still struggles with bedwetting. While Brady may not wake up wet every night, he certainly has more wet mornings than dry ones and this is a problem that can be frustrating and embarrassing for him. His parents know he cannot control his accidents and are patient with him but obviously want him to stop as soon as possible.
12131.title: Eleven.

121311.content: Ok first, does Brady use any form of protection?
121311.title: Continue this story

choices: Another form of protection (plastic sheet, bedcover, alarm...)
1213111.content: What does Brady use to protect himself / his bed from ending up soaked in the morning.
1213111.title: Yes

12131111.content:
Which will we go with?

Diapers - tape on, very absorbent but bulky and crinkle noticeably.

Pull-ups - slip on like underwear, less absorbent than a diaper but also less noticeable.
12131111.title: Diapers/youth pull ups

121311111.content:
Even when Brady stops drinking anything after dinner, he still has very heavy wet accidents every so often. As Brady got older, his parents would always try to have him wear pull-ups instead of diapers, but he would always manage to wet the pull-ups to the point of leaking onto his pjs and bedding. This means that at the age of 11 Brady still has to wear thick tape-on diapers to bed.

It can be hard for some kids to tape themselves into diapers and they may need help putting them on the right way, does Brady need help putting his diaper on?
121311111.title: Diaper

1213111111.content: Who is usually the one helping Brady change?
1213111111.title: Yes

12131111111.content:
Brady’s parents have been changing him into diapers every night for the the past few years or so, his nights typically follow a routine: after his family eats dinner, Brady showers and makes sure to use the bathroom, then is changed into his night diaper by one of his parents, he is then free to do whatever he wants for about an hour and a half until it is bedtime.

Brady is just getting out of the shower as he drys off his body with a towel, he goes to his room and finishes drying off and then waits for someone to come in and help him get diapered.

Who comes in to diaper him
12131111111.title: A parent

12131111112.content: So a sibling typically helps Brady change his diapers when he needs to. Is it a brother or sister?
12131111112.title: Sibling

121311112.content:
Brady doesn't really need the added absorbency of tape on diapers and frankly ehe saw them as “babyish”, even more so than his pull-ups, which were blue with space designs that included stars and rocket ships, some stars on the front even fade away when he wets the pull-up.

We join Brady just as he is...
121311112.title: Pull-up

choices: Just a pair of pj shorts
1213111121.content:
Brady emerged from the bathroom with a towel wrapped around his waist, he made his way to his room, shutting the door behind him. He swiftly dried his body, once he was dry he swung open his closet door and reached into the large box the housed his night time underwear.

Brady took out one of the blue crinkling pull-ups and stepped each foot into its respective leg hole, being sure to pay attention to which side said “back” on it as he slid the soft pull-up up to the middle of his legs, stopping to pour a little bit of powder over his privates and rubbing it in. He slid the pull-up all the way up. “Now what to wear for tonight” he thought as he opened his pajama drawer.
1213111121.title: Getting ready for bed

choices: Go down stairs and see what his family is up to
12131111211.content:
Brady takes out a pair of cut off sweatpants and slides them up to his waist, a few inches of the pull-up still peeks up from above the shorts. He decides to go without a shirt for tonight as it was a warm summer night.

Brady looks at the digital clock on his nightstand, he still had about an hour and a half before he had to go to bed. What does Brady get up to now?
12131111211.title: Just a pair of pj shorts

1213111122.content: What else may we find Brady doing?
1213111122.title: Something else

12131111221.content:
Finally! School was out and summer break had officially began for Brady and his class. The exits of the middle school were flooded with jittery students who all made their way to their respective busses. Brady found a seat with his good friend and neighbor, Carter, who was 10, but only a few months younger than Brady.

The two boys talked over the immense volume if the other kids on the bus about their plans for the summer, “we have to go to water world,” Brady says excitedly, “my mom said they built a new slide that is 20 stories high!” Carter agreed as he and Brady had made it a habit to visit the water park in their town as often as possible.

“Hey you should sleepover my house tonight,” Carter says, “I just got a few new PS4 games and my dad put lights in my pool area so we could night swim!” Brady wanted to sleepover Carter’s, but a feeling of nervousness hit him as he was reminded about his bedwetting problem, ever since Brady was injured in a hockey game and suffered a concussion, he has started to wet the bed, so often that his parents have convinced him to wear pull-ups to bed as to minimize the mess it makes.

Before we continue, does Carter know about Brady’s bedwetting problem?
12131111221.title: Packing for a sleepover

121311112212.content:
Brady agreed to sleepover Carter’s house as his house was very fun to play at. Brady had been over his house many times, but had always found a way to avoid sleeping over since his bedwetting had started, but this time he was very excited for the beginning of summer that he felt like taking a chance to have fin with his friend.

The bus stopped at Brady’s house first, he said bye to Carter and made a plan to walk to his house after he ate dinner. Brady entered his house and immediately asked his mom if it was ok to sleepover at Carter’s.

“Well its ok with me just as ling as you know you’ll still have to wear a ‘you-know-what when you go to bed.” His mother said.
“I know but i really want to stay over his house.” Brady sighed, “besides, i don’t think Carter would care if he found out, i just hope he wouldnt laugh.”
“I think you’re right sweetie, now why dont you go pack a bag now so you can leave right after dinner.”

Brady went up to his room and emptied his school backpack and thought over what he had to bring. He knew he needed to bring swim trunks for the pool, a pull-up, and pajamas, preferably ones that are baggy to hide his pull up.

Does Brady think enough to hide the pull-up in the bottom of his bag to avoid it slipping out?
121311112212.title: No

1213111122122.content:
Brady randomly threw what he needed into his backpack, not thinking about the order in which he would need to take everything out, his swim trunks were at the bottom of the bag with his Nintendo switch and charger, he decided to pack two pull-ups as sometimes he woke up in the middle of the night in need of a new one he was at least he was careful enough to hide his pull-ups inside of his pjs that he packed.

After he was all packed, Brady had dinner with his family, his mother talked to him about being on his best behavior for Carter’s parents, even though Brady was not much of a trouble maker to begin with.

It was about 6:30 when Brady started his short walk to Carter’s house. When he got there he knocked on the door and Carter was quick to answer and greet him excitedly. Brady greeted Carter’s parents before the two boys ran upstairs into Carter’s room, which was fully decorated with Star Wars posters and completed lego sets.

“So what fo you want to do?” Carter asks Brady.
1213111122122.title: No

12131111221221.content:
“Lets go swimming!” Brady replies. Carter agrees and walks over to his closet to grab his swim trunks. Brady opens his bag and begins to dig for his as well. As he is doing so his pjs slip out of his bag along with the two pull-ups he packed, the blue and green diaper-looking undergarments were in full view for a brief moment before Brady notices and jams them down to the bottom of his bag.

Does Carter notice this?
12131111221221.title: “Lets go swimming!”

121311112212211.content:
It just so happened that Carter was looking in Brady’s general direction when he saw the pull-ups slip out of his backpack. He saw Brady frantically put them back in before looking to see if Carter noticed. “Were those diapers?” Carter asked quizzically. Brady tried hiding his embarrassment but he could not control his blushing as his freckled face grew bright red.

“No, theyre just underwear.” This was Brady’s last ditch effort to keep Carter from knowing his problem, but it proved to be a hopeless effort.

“Dude i know they were diapers, Luke wears diapers to bed too and they look like those.” Luke was Carter’s 6 year old little brother, who looked similar to the blond haired boy but was significantly shorter.

Brady sighed, he knew the gig was up and he had to come clean and be honest with Carter now, “ok theyre not diapers, theyre pull-ups and i need them because i... sort of... wet the bed sometimes.” Brady managed to say this quickly, like ripping off a band-aid there still remained a crackle in his voice as he was bordering on the point of tears. Carter picks up on this and sits on the bed next to his slightly older friend.

“Dude, its ok, i dont care if you need them, like i said im used to it with Luke having to wear them every night.” Carter rubs Brady on the back until he calms down enough to reply to him. A smile then streaks across Brady’s face, he knew his friend would’t make fun of him for wearing pull-ups.
“Thanks for being cool about it man, i get really embarrassed about it sometimes ‘cus i just cant help it.”
The two boys talk for a few more minutes before changing into their swim trunks and running downstairs and into the pool area. They played a bunch of different games and Luke even joined in too. The boys played until about 8 o’clock, when they decided to dry off and change. They took turns showering and changing into their pjs. Brady showered last and put his pull-up on in the bathroom followed by a pair of pj shorts and a shirt that went down to just below his waist, in order to hide his pull up. He looks himself over in the mirror, the shorts were a little tight and there was a slight bulge in the back of his pants but this was only obvious if his shirt was lifted up, along with the small portion of blue material that showed above the waist if his shorts.

Brady exits the bathroom and walks to Crater’s room to the tune of a slight crinkle sound coming from his pants. Carter noticed this but of course didnt say anything as to not embarrass his friend. “My parents said we can have a campfire and roast marshmallows too if you want to”. Carter says

What do the boys do next
121311112212211.title: Yes

choices: In the middle of the night...
1213111122122111.content:
The boys went outside to the backyard where Carter’s dad was already starting the fire. They sat down next to each other and started talking about sports. Carter’s dad even threw in his comments here and there as he was as big of a hockey and football fan as the two boys.

A few minutes later, Luke walked out to join them, Brady noticed Luke was wearing a pull-up under his pjs as he could hear the slight crinkle and could see a noticeable amount above the waist of Luke’s pjs, he noticed that they wore the same brand, just different sizes as The designs on Luke’s were more for little kids where as Brady’s had older kid designs like skateboards and camo designs.

The boys sat by the fire and made smores for about 2 hours, they decided to call it a night at around 10 pm, which was late for all three of the boys, especially Luke, who was sound asleep in his chair. Carter’s dad picked up the sleeping boy and stuck a finger down his pants to check if he was wet. Brady wondered if Luke had already wet himself after being asleep for only about a half hour, as he sometimes found himself wet after falling asleep during a movie of even in the car, which has made it so pull-ups are required for car ride that are over an hour.

Carter and Brady went up to Carter’s room to set up for bed, an air mattress was placed on the ground right next to Carter’s bed complete with a blanket and pillow for Brady. Brady stepped out to go to the bathroom, as he was doing so he walked by Luke’s room, where he saw Luke being helped into a dry pull-up by his dad. “I guess he was wet after all” Brady thought to himself, “at least it isnt me” he could have easily wet himself at the fire but decided to hold it in and wait to use the toilet.

He got to the bathroom and did his business and returned to Carter’s room where Carter was playing on his nintendo switch, Carter looked up at Brady as he walked into the room, he had known his friend was wearing a pull-up all night not only because he told him but there were multiple times throughout the night that Brady’s shirt had rode up and revealed the bright blue pull-up and the bulge in his butt area. Of course Carter did not mention any of these times to his friend but there was a rising level of curiosity in the younger boys head that wondered what it would be like to be in a pull up at his age.

Carter’s dad declared lights out after about a half hour of the boys taking turns on the switch. The boys had no argument as both of them were fighting the urge to fall asleep. Within minutes both boys were sound asleep in their respective beds.
1213111122122111.title: Have a fire

12131111221221112.content:
Brady is woken up in the middle if the night, he sees it is still dark out through Carter’s window, and the digital alarm clock reads “3:43” In bright green numbers from across the room.

What is it that woke Brady up?
12131111221221112.title: In the middle of the night...

choices: The ship falls apart and Captain Brady falls into the sea, leaving him soaked.
The storm lightens up, and the skies begin to clear
121311112212211121.content:
Brady recalls the dream he just had...

A storm rages over head and rain pours down from the sky and onto the wooden deck of the ship, Brady is at the helm attempting to navigate his way through the storm. The ship is taking a beating as wave after wave of relentless sea water crashes against the ship, the wooden hull begins to crack and some pieces fall into the water and drift away.

In the real world, Brady tosses and turns on his air mattress, slight moans and groans can be heard from him as well as a slight crinkle of his pull-up with every move he makes.

Back in his dream, thunder booms over head and the ship is rocking about in the rogue waters, the hull of the ship continues to crack and it cannot continue to take this amount of damage. The winds howl and thunder continues to roar. Just then...
121311112212211121.title: Bad dream

1213111122122111211.content:
A massive wave crashes against the fragile ship, this was too much for it and the ship is completely destroyed. Brady is tossed from the deck and hurls through the air before plunging into the freezing ocean water. This was enough to jolt him awake as he returns to reality, breathing heavily, Brady begins to recall where he is.

Now fully aware of his surroundings, Brady sees that it is still dark outside and the clock reads “3:43”, he begins to calm down as he realizes that it was all just a dream and he is in no danger of drowning. However, the thought of drowning did remind him of the fact that he was wearing a pull-up, he reached down and stuck his hand under his pj pants to check the pull-up, he realized that he was soaked as he felt the warm wet feeling all around his diaper area, the wetness even creeped down by his bum as he was sleeping on his back.

This was nothing too surprising to Brady as he did have the occasional heavy wetting night where he would wake up with a pull-up that was teetering on the point of leaking. There were even times where Brady wasn’t lucky enough to even wake up after wetting, which usually meant his pull-up would be leaking by the morning. This always leads his mother to threaten him with thick, tape-style diapers instead of pull-ups, something Brady would no doubt hate.

He could put it in the bathroom trash, but that would mean the next person who went in there would surely see it and know it was him. Another idea popped into his head, “Luke’s room” he thought as the younger boy had to have a trash can suitable for pull-ups in his room, but did he want to risk waking Luke up, or worse... Carter!

As Anna's mother was helping her clean up, she said, "Guess what?!".
"What?" said Anna excitedly!
"We're going on a day out! You, Jack, and me!" said the mother.
"Hooray!" said Anna and she changed into underwear, a blue skirt, an orange shirt, and white socks and sneakers, all ready for her trip to...
122131222.title: Changes Sarah into undies* for a day out

122131223.content:
Anna's mother helped her clean up.
Then, Anna got changed into a purple skirt, underwear, yellow socks, black shoes, and a white T-shirt.
Then, Jack changed into his green pants, blue shirt, and red shoes.
He could mostly do this on his own but needed help putting his shoes on.
The mom brushed Anna's hair, then both kids had breakfast and brushed their teeth.
Finally, she helped them pack their lunches.
Soon, Anna was ready for school and Jack was ready for preschool.
The kids got to school by...
122131223.title: Gets Anna ready for school after a quick clean up

choices: Anna gets cleaned up and dressed.
12213123.content:
"Ha ha!" said Jack, "You're older than me but you wear diapers!"
"Only at night," said Anna.
"But I don't have to wear diapers at night!" said Jack.
"Some people do, some people don't," said their mother, "That's all there is to it. But she'll probably grow out of it."
What happens now?
12213123.title: Her brother spots her and teases her

choices: Waking up in the middle of the night.
122132.content:
Anna was potty trained at three and was dry for a while, but when she was five, she started wetting the bed.
Thankfully, she was taken to the doctor and the cause was not medical, and she's doing fine psychologically, so it's probably deep sleep.
She wears Pull-Ups to bed.
Where is she now?
122132.title: B

choices: Waking up in the middle of the night.
122133.content:
Anna has only just recently started wetting the bed again.
Where is she now?
122133.title: C

1222.content: How old exactly is this girl?

1223.content: What's the exact age of our heroine?

choices: She is at a slumber party
She is at home just about getting ready for bed
She is playing with her sister
12231.content:
Megan has always been a bedwetter.
There have been times before where it got a little better for the short brown haired girl, when she was using an alarm and for a couple of month she was even taking meds. But the alarm stressed her a lot, she even got nightmares of that awful beeping and the midicine made her feel dizzy all the time.
Now, without alarms and meds, she feels better but wets every night again.


How does our story starts?
12231.title: Eleven.

122311.content:
Megan had a nice day.
Right after lunch her mom brought her to her best friend Lisa.
She was not only there to spend the afternoon, tonight they would have a sleepover!

Was it just the two friends or are other friends around too?
122311.title: She is at a slumber party

choices: Yes and shes a bedwetter too/other
1223111.content: Does Lisa allready knows that her best friend is a bedwetter?
1223111.title: Just Megan and Lisa

choices: Lisa is a bedwetter like Megan and they both know
They both wet the bed but dont know about the other
Megan doesnt know that Lisa knows her secret
12231113.content: Lisa is a bedwetter too or something else?
12231113.title: Yes and shes a bedwetter too/other

info.description:
Rules:
1. Nothing creepy/pervy.
2. Keep it realistic.
3. Focus on bedwetting and nighttime toilet training. Naps are okay as a mini-focus but don't focus on daytime training or accidents.
